pyiTriageDesktopDownload.header: Use the GOV.UK One Login app to prove your identity

content.paragraph1: The GOV.UK One Login app works by matching your face to your photo ID.
content.paragraph2: First you will need to download, open and use the app. Then you will come back to this page to finish proving your identity.
content.subHeading1: 1. Download the GOV.UK One Login app
content.paragraph3: Scan the QR code with your smartphone to download the GOV.UK One Login app.
content.warningText: The app uses a face scan with flashing colours
content.qrCodeAlt: QR code to download the app
content.subHeading2: Help using the GOV.UK One Login app

details1.summaryText: How to scan a QR code
details1.list1: Open the camera app on your phone.
details1.list2: Position your camera over the QR code.
details1.list3: Wait until the QR code is recognised by your camera and a link appears on your screen.
details1.list4: Position your camera over the QR code.
details1.list5: Tap the link to go to the App Store (for iPhone) or Play Store (for Android).
details1.list6: Download the GOV.UK One Login app.

details2.summaryText: How to download the app without a QR code
details2.list2: On your phone, open the App Store (for iPhone) or Play Store (for Android).
details2.list3: Search for the ‘GOV.UK One Login’ app.
details2.list4: Download the GOV.UK One Login app.

details3.summaryText: I am sensitive to flashing colours
details3.html:
The face scan checks that you’re a real person. It uses different colours that change less than 3 times per second.

You can prove your identity another way if you think you might be sensitive to flashing colours.

details4.summaryText: Oes angen i mi dynnu fy sbectol?
details4.html:
Pan fyddwch yn sganio’ch wyneb, gallwch gadw’ch sbectol ymlaen cyn belled nad oes ganddynt dint.

Os ydych yn gwisgo sbectol gyda thint, bydd angen i chi eu tynnu pan fyddwch yn sganio’ch wyneb.

details5.summaryText: I’d prefer not to use the app
details5.html: If you’d prefer not to use the app, you may be able to prove your identity another way.

content.subHeading3: 2. Open the GOV.UK One Login app
content.paragraph4: Follow the instructions in the app to prove your identity. Keep this page open while you do this.
content.paragraph5: If we successfully match your face to your photo ID, you’ll finish proving your identity online.
content.paragraph6: Then you can continue to the government service you want to use.

content.paragraph2: Byddwch angen ffôn clyfar a ID gyda llun i brofi eich hunaniaeth.
content.subHeading: Beth sydd angen i chi ei wneud
list: Atebwch ychydig o gwestiynau am eich ID gyda llun a’r ddyfais rydych yn ei defnyddio. Mae hyn er mwyn sicrhau y gallwch ddefnyddio’r ap GOV.UK ID Check.
Byddwn yn dweud wrthych sut i lawrlwytho a defnyddio’r ap i brofi eich hunaniaeth gyda’ch ID gyda llun.
Byddwn yn gwirio bod eich ID gyda llun yn cyfateb i’ch GOV.UK One Login.
Dewiswch sut rydych am gael codau diogelwch. Gallwch gael codau wedi’u hanfon at rif ffôn symudol neu eu cael o ap dilysu.
Parhau i’r gwasanaeth rydych angen ei ddefnyddio.
